data.name: Confirm.User.Delete
data.value: A o tlhomamisegile gore o batla go phimola {0}?

data.name: AllowRegistration.HelpText
data.value: ● A o batla gore baeti ba ba sa itsegeng ba kgone go ikwadisa mo webosaeteng ya gago?

data.name: RegisterUrl.HelpText
data.value: Romela Romela URL ya Kwadiso ya Setlwaedi

data.name: ProfileUrl.HelpText
data.value: Optionally provide a custom user profile url

data.name: LockoutDuration.HelpText
data.value: Palo ya metsotso e modirisi a tshwanetseng go e tswalela

data.name: MaximumFailures.HelpText
data.value: Palo e e kwa godimo ya matshwao a modirisi pele ga modirisi a tswalelwa

data.name: RequireDigit.HelpText
data.value: Bontsha gore a diphasewete di tshwanetse go nna le dinomoro tse di farologaneng

data.name: RequiredLength.HelpText
data.value: Boleele jo bo kwa tlase jwa password

data.name: RequireLower.HelpText
data.value: Bontsha gore a ditshwantsho di tshwanetse go nna le ditlhaka tse di kwa tlase

data.name: RequirePunctuation.HelpText
data.value: Bontsha gore a diphasewete di tshwanetse go nna le ditlhaka tse di seng tsa alphanumeric (ke gore, matshwao)

data.name: RequireUpper.HelpText
data.value: Bontsha gore a ditshwantsho di tshwanetse go nna le ditlhaka tse di kwa godimo

data.name: Success.UpdateConfig.Restart
data.value: Configuration Updated. Tsweetswee tobetsa konopo ya go simolola sešwa gore diphetogo tseno di tsentswe tirisong.

data.name: UniqueCharacters.HelpText
data.value: Palo e e kwa tlase ya ditlhaka tse di kgethegileng tse mokwadi a tshwanetseng go nna le tsone

data.name: AllowSiteLogin.HelpText
data.value: ● A o batla go letla badirisi ba gago gore ba kgone go ikwadisa ka go dirisa leina la modirisi le phasewete tse di laolwang mo webosaeteng eno? Ela tlhoko gore o tshwanetse go tima tlhopho eno fela fa o setse o rulagantse motlamedi wa go tsena ka fa ntle, go seng jalo o ka itswalela mo webosaeteng.

data.name: Authority.HelpText
data.value: URL ya Bolaodi kgotsa URL e e amanang le motlamedi wa boitshupo

data.name: AuthorizationUrl.HelpText
data.value: Gae Sekgoa go ya go Setswana license code

data.name: ClientID.HelpText
data.value: ID ya moreki go motlamedi wa boitshupo

data.name: ClientSecret.HelpText
data.value: Gae Sekgoa go ya go Setswana identity provider

data.name: CreateUsers.HelpText
data.value: A o batla gore badirisi ba bašwa ba tlhamiwe ka boiketlo? Fa o thibela tlhopho eno, badirisi ba tshwanetse go bo ba setse ba ikwadisitse mo webosaeteng gore ba kgone go tsena ka go tsena mo webosaeteng ya bone.

data.name: DomainFilter.HelpText
data.value: Provide any email domain filter criteria (separated by commas). Domains to exclude should be prefixed with an exclamation point (!). For example 'microsoft.com,!hotmail.com' would include microsoft.com email addresses but not hotmail.com email addresses.

data.name: EmailClaimType.HelpText
data.value: Optionally specify the type name of the email address claim provided by the identity provider. The typical value is 'email'.

data.name: MetadataUrl.HelpText
data.value: The discovery endpoint for getting metadata for this identity provider. Tlhalosa fela fa motlamedi wa boitshupo a sa dirise mokgwa o o tlwaelegileng (sekao: /well-known/openid-configuration)

data.name: PKCE.HelpText
data.value: Bontsha gore a motlamedi wa tshedimosetso o tshegetsa senotlolo sa khoutu ya khoutu (PKCE)

data.name: ProviderName.HelpText
data.value: Tlhagisa leina le le maleba la motlamedi yo o tla tlhagelelang mo tsebeng e e kwadilweng mo tsebeng ya Lefapha la Merero ya Selegae.

data.name: ProviderType.HelpText
data.value: Select the external login provider type

data.name: RedirectUrl.HelpText
data.value: Tshedimosetso e e kwadisitsweng (kgotsa e e kwadisitsweng) e gantsi e tshwanetseng go kwadisiwa le motlamedi wa tshedimosetso

data.name: Scopes.HelpText
data.value: Foromo ya kopo go tswa go motlamedi wa tshedimosetso (e e kgaogantsweng ke di-commas). Fa go se na dithulaganyo tse di tlhalositsweng, Scopes tse di tlwaelegileng di tla dirisiwa ka bosakhutleng.

data.name: UserInfoUrl.HelpText
data.value: Tsela e e maleba ya go bona tshedimosetso ya modirisi. This should be an API endpoint or page url which contains the user email address.

data.name: Audience.HelpText
data.value: Gae Ranola Sekgoa go ya go Setswana token

data.name: CookieName.HelpText
data.value: O ka tlhopha go dirisa leina la khukhi la netefatso mo webosaeteng nngwe le nngwe. Le fa go ntse jalo, tsweetswee ela tlhoko gore fa o batla go abelana dikhukhi tsa netefatso magareng ga diwebosaete tse di mo domain e le nngwe, o tshwanetse go dirisa leina la khukhi le le sa fetogeng. Also be aware that changing the authentication cookie name will logout all current users.

data.name: Issuer.HelpText
data.value: Ka boikgethelo go neelana ka motlamedi wa letshwao

data.name: Lifetime.HelpText
data.value: Palo ya metsotso e letshwao le tshwanetseng go nna le seabe mo go lone

data.name: Secret.HelpText
data.value: Fa e le gore o batla go nna le seabe mo ditirong tsa gago, tsweetswee tlhagisa sephiri se se tla dirisiwang go boloka ditshwantsho tsa gago. Sephiri se tshwanetse go nna le ditlhaka di le 16 kgotsa go feta go netefatsa tshireletsego e e siameng. Tsweetswee ela tlhoko gore fa o ka fetola sephiri se, matshwao otlhe a a leng teng a tla bo a sa amogelesege mme a tla tshwanelwa ke go tsosolosiwa.

data.name: Token.HelpText
data.value: Tobetsa konopo ya Create Token go tlhagisa letshwao la phitlhelelo ya nako e telele (e e dirang ngwaga o le 1). Netefatsa gore o boloka letshwao leno mo lefelong le le babalesegileng ka gonne ga o kitla o kgona go le fitlhelela mo nakong e e tlang.

data.name: TwoFactor.HelpText
data.value: Do you want users to use two factor authentication? Ela tlhoko gore o tshwanetse go dirisa tlhopho ya Disabled go fitlha o tlhomamisa ka katlego gore Tiro ya Kitsiso mo Ditiro Tse di Rulagantsweng e kgontshitswe mme dikgetho tsa gago tsa SMTP mo Diseting tsa Lefelo di rulagantswe go seng jalo o tla itswalela kwa ntle.

data.name: IdentifierClaimType.HelpText
data.value: Specify the type name of the unique user identifier claim provided by the identity provider. The default value is 'sub'.

data.name: Parameters.HelpText
data.value: Optionally specify any additional parameters as name/value pairs to send to the identity provider (separated by commas if there are multiple).

data.name: RoleClaimType.HelpText
data.value: Optionally provide the type name of the roles claim provided by the identity provider (the standard default is 'roles'). If role names from the identity provider do not exactly match your site role names, please use the Role Claim Mappings.

data.name: RoleClaimMappings.HelpText
data.value: Optionally provide a comma delimited list of role names provided by the identity provider, as well as mappings to your site roles. For example if the identity provider includes an 'Admin' role name and you want it to map to the 'Administrators' site role you should specify 'Admin:Administrators'.

data.name: SynchronizeRoles.HelpText
data.value: This option will add or remove role assignments so that the site roles exactly match the roles provided by the identity provider for a user

data.name: ProfileClaimTypes.HelpText
data.value: Optionally provide a comma delimited list of user profile claim type names provided by the identity provider, as well as mappings to your user profile definition. For example if the identity provider includes a 'given_name' claim and you have a 'FirstName' user profile definition you should specify 'given_name:FirstName'.

data.name: AuthFlow.CodeIdTokenToken
data.value: Authorization Code + ID Token + Access Token

data.name: AuthResponseType.HelpText
data.value: Tlhalosa mofuta wa karabo ya tumelelo. Default ke Authorization Code e e tsewang e le tlhopho e e babalesegileng go gaisa e e ikaegileng ka tlhaloso ya bosheng ya OAuth.

data.name: VerifyUsers.HelpText
data.value: Do you want existing users to perform an additional email verification step to link their external login? Fa o tima tlhopho eno, badirisi ba ba leng teng ba tla golaganngwa ka boyona.

data.name: AlwaysRemember.HelpText
data.value: Go kgontsha tlhopho eno go tla tlhoma khukhu ya leruri mmogo le nako ya go fela ga khukhi, e e tla tsenang ka boitiriso mo badirisi nako e e tlang fa ba etela legae la enthanete. By default the site will use session cookies.

data.name: CookieExpiration.HelpText
data.value: You can choose to use a custom authentication cookie expiration timespan for each site (e.g. '08:00:00' for 8 hours). The default is 14 days if not specified.

data.name: ReviewClaims.HelpText
data.value: This option will record the full list of Claims returned by the Provider in the Event Log. E tshwanetse go dirisiwa fela mo mabakeng a go tlhatlhoba. External Login will be restricted when this option is enabled.

data.name: NameClaimType.HelpText
data.value: Optionally specify the type name of the user's name claim provided by the identity provider. The typical value is 'name'.

data.name: Provider.HelpText
data.value: Tlhopha motlamedi wa go tsena kwa ntle

data.name: SaveTokens.HelpText
data.value: Tlhalosa gore a phitlhelelo le di-tokens di tshwanetse go bolokwa morago ga go tsena ka katlego. Le fa go ntse jalo, go fokotsega ga sediriswa se se fokotsegileng go fokotsa bogolo jwa sediriswa se se rileng.

data.name: LogoutEverywhere.HelpText
data.value: A o batla gore badirisi ba tsene mo sedirisiweng sengwe le sengwe se se matlhagatlhaga mo sedirisiweng sengwe le sengwe, kgotsa mo sedirisiweng sengwe le sengwe se ba se dirisang?

data.name: AllowHostRole.HelpText
data.value: Bontsha gore a dikarolo tsa moamogedi di tshegediwa ke motlamedi wa boitshupo. Tsweetswee dirisa tlhopho eno ka gonne e letla modirisi wa modirisi go laola lefelo lengwe le lengwe mo sedirisiweng sa gago.
